bio: Web2 dev by day, web3 dev on spare time. Mainly contributing to pooltogether.  Twitter @td366 - Farcaster sliponit. Main wallets sliponit.lens and sliponit.eth
contributionDescription:
mint-to-atst: This project allows to issue an attestation from the deployer of a NFT smart contract to the minter of said NFT automatically.

We use a demo smart contract for NFT from thirdweb https://thirdweb.com/thirdweb.eth/OpenEditionERC721

Alchemy is used for listening to the NFT smart contract mints and send a webhook to a cloudflare worker https://www.alchemy.com/custom-webhooks

The cloudflare worker receives mint events from the alchemy webhook. It does the atst creation from the contract deployer

contributionLinks.description: Automatically issue an attestation to the minter of said NFT.

impactDescription: This project was submitted for eth online 2023. I did not have time to promote it yet. I have asked around mainly in the pooltogether discord and it seems of interest. I plan to promote more the project on both twitter and farcaster and maybe other means too.
pwCategorySuggestions: Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), Web3 Community Platform, Decentralized Identity
